Introducing Frontier
Template Style Guide

Frontier is the ultimate starting point for agencies & studios looking to excel their online presence and win more clients. Frontier sets the foundation of beauty, functionality and a unique brand experience for clients.

Product Overview

‍

Frontier - Webflow Studio & Agency Template

Your agency/studio website is very often the first touchpoint for clients and it needs to impress. It needs to impress them with not only the design, but primarily it's functionality. A beaufiul, responsive and functional website speaks volumes for your business attention to detail and care. This high standard must be carried across all pages and devices.

We have built frontier to literally be the ultimate starting point for high-end studios and agencies. In seconds, you can change the colour, typography, imagery and create a completely unique to your brand experience for cutomsers. Watch the design transform to suit your own business as you begin editing, take it a step further with smooth scrolling, custom code interactions, and anything your creative brain can inspire. (We have guides for these things!)

Ultra clean class-naming and construction makes it SO easy to edit, and no complex combo-classes withj crazy positioning to throw you off your game. Did we mentioned it's backed by one of the leading webflow teams? We offer expert support, tons of guides and components & freebies that can help you extend your builds.


‍

100% Customisable

Our templates are 100% customisable - we just give you the ultimate headstart. Change the colours, container sizes, spacing or anything you like to suit your project and to own the design in everyway. That's the beauty of Webflow - our templates can be used across an unlimited amount of projects and our team encourages you to get creative.

Webflow Expert Development (Flowbase Team)

We use expert Webflow development principles across all our products. You can feel comfortable knowing that our templates are always updated to match the latest Webflow features.

We pride ourselves in building to the highest level of quality, ensuring that clear class-naming and structure makes it easy for you to truely take control. Our templates are built to suit both beginners and experts with clear and clean construction.

Webflow Expert Support

We provide support for all customers using our products. Please contact us if you notice anything strange, have any problems or just want to say hello. We're always listening and we generally respond within 24 hours. You can get in contact via support@flowbase.co

Style Guide & Utility Pages

You can easily change the style of base elements like buttons, headers and paragraphs from the Style Guide page. The utility pages (404, Password) are also included.

Usage Rights

All the images in this template can be used for personal or commercial usage. You can view the source for all images on our templates licence page. *If you would like access to the figma orginal working files, please email proof of purchase to support@flowbase.co

Figure & Figure Caption

Looking for something else? Visit flowbase.co

Figures

What’s a Rich Text element?

The rich text element allows you to create and format headings, paragraphs, blockquotes, images, and video all in one place instead of having to add and format them individually. Just double-click and easily create content.

Static and dynamic content editing

A rich text element can be used with static or dynamic content. For static content, just drop it into any page and begin editing. For dynamic content, add a rich text field to any collection and then connect a rich text element to that field in the settings panel. Voila!

How to customize formatting for each rich text

Headings, paragraphs, blockquotes, figures, images, and figure captions can all be styled after a class is added to the rich text element using the "When inside of" nested selector system.
